title: Calvin Klein Men's Straight Fit Jeans
description: STRAIGHT FIT: Calvin Klein’s reimagined jeans for men sit at the waist with a straight fit through the seat and thigh and a straight leg.
MADE WITH STRETCH: For easy movement and comfortable, all-day wear, Calvin Klein’s men’s jeans are crafted with flexible, stretch-infused denim combining comfort and an ultra-clean look.

CONSIDERED DETAILS: Offered in multiple inseams, Calvin Klein’s stretch jeans feature classic 5-pocket styling, reinforced seams, metal hardware in a light nickel finish, redrawn back pocket omega stitching and soft leather logo patch in contrast colors.
DESIGNED IN THE USA: By Calvin Klein’s NYC-based global design team using premium imported materials.
CARE: Care for your denim sustainably - wash sparingly, inside out in cold water, hang dry
The Calvin Klein brand is an icon of sleek minimalism for the Modern Man and Woman. Products include apparel, accessories and home goods with clean lines and modern appeal.
